TopicTitle: This Weeks stupid question comes from..........

Articles.Content:
Yes me again folks and this weeks problem / question is why does my game crash every time i try to land in the large desert on kerbin? is it the kethane mod or somthing else?

Answers on a sealed down envolepe signed by both set of grandparents to ...............
Have you tried running a clean install? It could also be a graphical or physics glitch. You land your desert lander elsewhere?
i can land everywhere else apart from the large desert
When it crashes, you should get a crash report. Try sending it off to them. Aside from some strange mod conflict, that might be only way to get a remedy.
